name: Knowledge Ingestion
summary: The systematic process of absorbing and integrating new knowledge.
explanation: Knowledge Ingestion is the systematic process of absorbing, processing, and integrating new information into your knowledge base. It involves capturing information from various sources, processing it (summarizing, highlighting, annotating), distilling key insights, connecting to existing knowledge, and storing appropriately. The process transforms raw information into usable knowledge. It's the workflow from consumption to capture to integration.

articles.title: The Knowledge Funnel - From Capture to Connected Notes
Transform Information Chaos Into Knowledge Power: A Simple 10-Step Process
